column5: Check out the CKDR web site and click on news. Information regarding the opening of Ontario nothing about the border opening.

Hi. Since we got an “Alexa” all I have to do to listen to that radio show is to say to Alexa is “ play CKDR radio! And there it is on our echo ll playing that station live or any other radio station we ask for. I was even thinking about when the border would open and just then the noon news came on from CKDR talking about just that, the border opening. It did say maybe by the end of June! AMAZING, JUST AMAZING how things work today. We are in Las Vegas listening to our favorite Canadian radio station CKDR. Do they still have the trade or sell segment on ?
